players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie's death is a tragedy. As the only one who can investigate, I urge the detective to share any findings carefully to avoid being targeted next. We must work together to find the mafia."

Bob: "I agree with Alice. Charlie's death is very concerning. As a villager, I have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on everyone's observations and deductions. Let's try to piece together what happened."
Diana: "I investigated Alice and she is the mafioso. We should vote her out immediately."
You: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Bob last night - he is a villager. Diana must be the mafia trying to frame me before I can expose her."
Diana: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and investigated her - she is mafia. Bob is confirmed innocent by her own admission. Vote Alice."

Bob: "This is very confusing. Alice claims to be the detective and says Bob is a villager. Diana claims to be the detective and says Alice is the mafia. One of them has to be lying. Since Charlie is dead, and we don't know who killed him..."
